Title: Covering Their Tails
Description:
The Nokhud drool over war stories of our kind's ancient past. In truth they are weak, playacting children. And with one strike of lightning, they have severed their connection to Ohn'ahra.

Well! If they will walk the path of corruption to seek war, then we will indulge them.

Of course, Bahir was left in command to cover his escape. Her blood will soon stain the ground.
PortraitGiverText: Left in charge by Balakar, Bahir has been waiting for this moment for a long time.
RewardText:
Balakar was an easy target for Koroleth's corrupting influence.

The storm has arrived.
